attribute.name.hexblade.convertfromfire: Fire Power gained as Attack Damage
attribute.name.hexblade.convertfromfrost: Frost Power gained as Attack Damage
attribute.name.hexblade.convertfromarcan: Arcane Power gained as Attack Damage
attribute.name.hexblade.converttofire: Attack Damage gained as Fire Power
attribute.name.hexblade.converttofrost: Attack Damage gained as Frost Power
attribute.name.hexblade.converttoarcane: Attack Damage gained as Arcane Power
attribute.name.hexblade.converttoheal: Attack Damage gained as Healing Power
attribute.name.hexblade.purpose: of Non-Healing Spell Power gained as Healing Power
attribute.name.hexblade.omni: Omniscience per 1 Basic Spell Power Attribute
attribute.desc.hexblade.omni: Omniscience is added onto your Basic Spell Power at the end of the calculation.
attribute.name.hexblade.omni.desc: Omniscience is added onto your Basic Spell Power at the end of the calculation.
hexblade.spellbladetext: Upon casting a spell with this Spellblade, you gain Strength and Haste equal to a quarter of your power relating to the spell's school, for up to however long the cooldown of the spell is.
item.hexblade.thesis_spell_book.desc: Fear not the mage who has cast a thousand different spells once, fear the mage who has cast a single spell a thousand times.
item.hexblade.thesis_spell_book.desc2: Awaken your spell at a spell binding table.
item.hexblade.tabula_rasa.desc: If you wish to be reborn, empty is the best way to be.
item.hexblade.tabula_rasa.desc2: Apply up to six Spell Oils onto this item.
item.hexblade.spelloil.desc1: Binds the spell to an item that can cast spells, but does not already have a spell bound.
item.hexblade.spelloil.desc2: Drag to an item and right click to apply. IRREVERSIBLE. See Spell Engine Keybind 1 if used incorrrectly.
spell.hexblade.thesis.name: Awakened
spell.hexblade.thesis.description: You have dedicated your life to the casting of one particular spell. You have 50%% more spell power and spell haste.
spell.hexblade.monkeyreflect.name: Rending Winds
spell.hexblade.monkeyreflect.description: Spin up a gust of wind, dealing heavy knockback and {damage} physical damage (can crit) per second to the target enemy.
spell.hexblade.monkeyslam.name: Grand Vault
spell.hexblade.monkeyslam.description: Leap into the clouds, becoming invulnerable while channeling.
spell.hexblade.reckoning.name: Monkey King's Reckoning
spell.hexblade.reckoning.description: Spin, dealing {damage} physical damage per second, multiplied by your attack speed. No penalty for hitting multiple enemies.
spell.hexblade.combustion.name: Phoenix Curse
spell.hexblade.combustion.description: Passive: On a cooldown, Your damage sets enemies on fire for 2 seconds and gives them Phoenix's Curse for the same duration, preventing fires on them from going out and dealing {damage} fire spell damage 4 times over 2 seconds. Active: Deal {damage} fire spell damage to nearby enemies.
spell.hexblade.phoenixdive.name: Phoenix Dive
spell.hexblade.phoenixdive.description: Blink towards the target direction, performing a nova for {damage} fire damage upon landing and setting hit enemies on fire.
spell.hexblade.snuffout.name: Wildfire
spell.hexblade.snuffout.description: The flames around you blaze into an inferno, causing enemies that are on fire to deal {damage} fire damage to enemies around them, extinguishing them
spell.hexblade.sniper.name: Runeblaze Round
spell.hexblade.sniper.description: Charge and shoot your rifle, dealing 2x ranged damage and an additional {damage} ranged physical damage.
spell.hexblade.overblaze.name: Incinerating Round
spell.hexblade.overblaze.description: Incinerate enemies in a line, dealing {damage} spell damage.
spell.hexblade.riflebarrage.name: Scrap Barrage
spell.hexblade.riflebarrage.description: Shoot repeatedly while channeling, dealing up to 1x ranged damage plus an additional {damage} spell damage per shot to enemies in a cone, based on proximity.
spell.hexblade.eldritchblast.name: Reverberating Ray
spell.hexblade.eldritchblast.description: Fire a blast in the target direction, dealing {damage} arcane damage to all enemies in a line. Expends all stacks of Unleash to repeat, once per stack.
spell.hexblade.echoes.name: Runic Echoes
spell.hexblade.echoes.description: Passive: You gain 1 stack of Unleash every 4 seconds. Active: Damage an enemy whose last melee hit taken was from you, dealing {damage} arcane damage. Normally cannot target an enemy more than once, unless you spend an unleash stack to do so.
spell.hexblade.bladestorm.name: Echostorm
spell.hexblade.bladestorm.description: Conjure a reverberating vortex, which homes into your target if you selected one, dealing {damage} arcane damage every half second. Goes on cooldown for 8 seconds unless you have an Unleash stack to spend.
spell.hexblade.flameslash.name: Flaming Laceration
spell.hexblade.flameslash.description: {damage} Fire DPS. Swing your weapon wildly, shooting flaming, exploding projectiles.
spell.hexblade.frostslash.name: Blade Flurry
spell.hexblade.frostslash.description: {damage} Frost DPS. Swing your weapon wildly, shooting bouncing, ricocheting blade projectiles.
spell.hexblade.amethystslash.name: Amethyst Splash
spell.hexblade.amethystslash.description: {damage} Arcane DPS. Swing your weapon wildly, shooting piercing amethyst projectiles.
spell.hexblade.arcaneoverdrive.name: Arcane Overdrive
spell.hexblade.arcaneoverdrive.descripti: {damage} Arcane damage in an area around you. Activates normally and on hit.
spell.hexblade.frostoverdrive.name: Frost Overdrive
spell.hexblade.frostoverdrive.descriptio: {damage} Frost damage in an area around you. Activates normally and on hit.
spell.hexblade.fireoverdrive.name: Flame Overdrive
spell.hexblade.fireoverdrive.description: {damage} Fire damage in an area around you. Activates normally and on hit.
spell.hexblade.finalstrike.name: Sonic Strike
spell.hexblade.finalstrike.description: Charge up a deadly attack against all enemies in a line, teleporting behind the last one and dealing {damage_1} physical damage plus an additional {damage_2} arcane spell damage. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 arcane power.
spell.hexblade.eviscerate.name: Massacre
spell.hexblade.eviscerate.description: Become intangible, attacking the nearest enemy five times over a second, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} frost damage, both multiplied by your attack speed. If this kills the enemy before the last hit, these effects continue onto another enemy. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 frost power.
spell.hexblade.whirlingblades.name: Riptide
spell.hexblade.whirlingblades.descriptio: Aim and launch yourself as if with a riptide-enchanted trident
spell.hexblade.flicker_strike.name: Flickering Flame
spell.hexblade.flicker_strike.descriptio: Jump onto nearby enemies equally, dealing {damage_1} physical damage plus an additional {damage_2} fire damage, scaled by attack speed. Focuses on one target if there is only one target. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 fire power.
spell.hexblade.frostblink.name: Arcane Flicker
spell.hexblade.frostblink.description: Teleport behind an enemy, dealing {damage_1} physical damage plus an additional {damage_2} arcane damage.
spell.hexblade.coldbuff.name: Ice King's Curse
spell.hexblade.coldbuff.description: If you have Frost Power IV+, unfreeze yourself, inflict 150%% freeze on nearby enemies, gaining Strength V for 8 seconds.
spell.hexblade.frostbloom0.name: Frost Lotus
spell.hexblade.frostbloom0.description: Perform a nova around you dealing {damage} damage, chilling enemies hit, gaining one stack of Frost Power, up to 4. Increases in area per Frost Power. Chills you on use.
spell.hexblade.deathchill.name: Deathchill
spell.hexblade.deathchill.description: Passive: You chill faster and heat up slower. Your damage saps the heat from enemies, inflicting chill on them. Active: Rapidly chill yourself, gaining up to Resistance III the longer you channel.
spell.hexblade.frostvert.name: Dragon Slam
spell.hexblade.frostvert.description: Perform a fiery slam, first launching yourself into the air if already airborne. Deals {damage_1} physical damage plus an additional {damage_2} fire damage in an area. You can land safely while performing this move.
spell.hexblade.smite.name: Divine Smite
spell.hexblade.smite.description: Smite enemies in front of you in an area, dealing {damage_1} physical and {damage_2} extra healing damage to each enemy hit, 50%% more healing damage against undead. Gives you the Spellblade passive upon use.
spell.hexblade.maelstrom.name: Maelstrom
spell.hexblade.maelstrom.description: Spin continuously, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} arcane damage per second, multiplied by attack speed. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 arcane power. Penalty for hitting multiple mobs, mitigated by Sweeping Edge. Shift to stop moving.
spell.hexblade.inferno.name: Inferno
spell.hexblade.inferno.description: Spin continuously, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} fire damage per second multiplied by attack speed. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 fire power. Penalty for hitting multiple mobs, mitigated by Sweeping Edge. Shift to stop moving.
spell.hexblade.tempest.name: Tempest
spell.hexblade.tempest.description: Spin continuously, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} frost damage per second, multiplied by attack speed. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 frost power. Penalty for hitting multiple mobs, mitigated by Sweeping Edge. Shift to stop moving.
spell.hexblade.whirlwind.name: Cyclone
spell.hexblade.whirlwind.description: Spin continuously, {damage} physical damage per second, multiplied by your attack speed. Penalty for hitting multiple mobs, mitigated by Sweeping Edge. Shift to stop moving.
spell.hexblade.arcaneflourish.name: Arcane Flourish
spell.hexblade.arcaneflourish.descriptio: Spin rapidly, dealing {damage_1} physical damage, plus {damage_2} arcane damage. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 arcane power.
spell.hexblade.fireflourish.name: Fire Flourish
spell.hexblade.fireflourish.description: Spin rapidly, dealing {damage_1} physical damage, plus {damage_2} fire damage. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 fire power.
spell.hexblade.frostflourish.name: Frost Flourish
spell.hexblade.frostflourish.description: Spin rapidly, dealing {damage_1} physical damage, plus {damage_2} frost damage. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 frost power.
